item.title: EP 163 - Schrodinger's Girl: The Case Of Pauline Picard
item.itunes:title: Schrodinger's Girl: The Case Of Pauline Picard
item.description:
Today we take a look at a study which proves the Earth is hollow, and then we examine the bizarre case of Pauline Picard.

An earthquake in 1994 was so powerful, the shock waves bounced back and forth across the planet. Based on readings of those shock waves scientist have concluced there are vast amounts of empty space underneath our feet. Do we live on a hollow Earth?

And then we look at the tale of Pauline Picard. When a 2-year-old French girls goes missing, the police begin looking for her. But then . . . they find two of her.

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer
https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer
https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg


Mountains buried 400 miles underground ‘could be BIGGER than Everest’
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-6709433/Mountains-buried-400-miles-underground-BIGGER-Everest.html

 

Huge Earthquake in Bolivia Has Revealed Vast Mountain Ranges Below Earth's Surface
https://www.sciencealert.com/a-huge-earthquake-in-bolivia-revealed-mountains-hundreds-of-kilometres-under-the-surface

 

How deep could a human go underground before heat/pressure/lack of oxygen would stop him from continuing?
https://www.quora.com/How-deep-could-a-human-go-underground-before-heat-pressure-lack-of-oxygen-would-stop-him-from-continuing

 

A nearly water-saturated mantle transition zone inferred from mineral viscosity
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5462500/

 

Massive 1994 Bolivian earthquake reveals mountains 660 kilometers below our feet
https://www.princeton.edu/news/2019/02/14/massive-1994-bolivian-earthquake-reveals-mountains-660-kilometers-below-our-feet

 

The Bizarre Case Of Pauline Picard
https://morbidology.com/the-mysterious-case-of-pauline-picard/

 

Listen tothe daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

An earthquake in 1994 was so powerful, the shock waves bounced back and forth across the planet. Based on readings of those shock waves scientist have concluced there are vast amounts of empty space underneath our feet. Do we live on a hollow Earth?
